overview:
Mr. Lituchy has extensive expertise in digital & direct marketing, and ecommerce as both an entrepreneur and corporate executive. Currently he is the founder and president of Hunter Digital, a digital marketing and ecommerce agency servicing emerging, small and mid-sized online retailers ($0 - $25,000,000 in online revenue).

Hunter Digital provides a wide array of services to help ecommerce companies scale, optimize and become more profitable. Main & Marketing, a division of Hunter Digital, was recently formed to service the local business market. At Main & Marketing Mr. Lituchy is spearheading a change in the mindset of the local merchant and professional and helping them to harness the power of digital media to grow their businesses.

Mr. Lituchy previously worked at Buddy Media as the VP, Digital Marketing where he oversaw all digital marketing and demand generation. He also played a prominent role in the company’s website strategy and content development.

Prior to joining Buddy Media, Eric headed up Consumer Marketing at eBillme Inc., where he oversaw the launch of companies shopping portal. Eric also handled all digital, search, affiliate, email and social marketing for the company.

Before coming to eBillme, Eric was the Founder and President of Delightful Deliveries, an online marketplace of gourmet gifts and gift baskets, which was named a Top 100 Website by Internet Retailer Magazine.
